column4: Does anyone know how to do Internet connection sharing with XP and Ubuntu?

you'll need a router, or at least a switch; either that or have two nics in one of the machines
2 NICS?
ethernet cards

Ahh, then you're all set.  Yes, a crossover will do it.  If you've got crimps and an ethernet end, you can make one.
